channel.title: Well this is my first release im tired of running the server so here you go!
channel.description:
I dont have the time to keep runnning my server.I had a couple people start running it for me but it just isnt working out..So i am going to release the server and client..I put tons of work into this and it took along time.I didnt add d claws seeing that they are over kill..But you can do what you want idc.the server is still online and will be offline within 2 weeks.The client still has the ip in it so you have to change it or it will connect to the server that is online sry if its advertizeing but it wont last long im turning it off just waiting for vps to run out.Im not posting pics due to the simple fact that im quiting i really dont care if any one uses it.the server is bloodspec.Do what u will.As i siad i put alot of work in it and ill check back to see what people think.good luck with it.If you do use it have alittle respect and post a relply.
Client download- [url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=KB2G2NPG]http://www.megaupload.com/?d=KB2G2NPG[/url] Server download- [url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=WCSB7N66]http://www.megaupload.com/?d=WCSB7N66[/url]

item.title: Well this is my first release im tired of running the server so here you go!
item.dc:creator: @I_kasoy_II Sohail
item.description:
@I_kasoy_II wrote:

[quote=“moulesy, post:2, topic:268470”] VERY NICE SERVER ALTHOUGH WHY DO YOU RELEASE THE CLIENT WHEN THE FILES ARE HIDDEN
AND YOUCANT CHANGE THE IP SORTIT OUT DUDE BUTNICE SERVER ANYWAY :)[/quote]

You sure this isn’t your other acount?
And if it isn’t post Pics.
And a virus scan.

Read full topic

item.description:
@lildude783 wrote:

nice server … if i figure out the client part ill give u a 7/10 for it ;D good luck with that …

but y did u give it up? … u coulda asked an experienced person for help … like skittle385 or me … ive made some people servers … and ive made clients too … but im still working on this client that u have … i could be a while … ;D good luck!

item.title: Well this is my first release im tired of running the server so here you go!
item.dc:creator: @i8u2x2002 i8u2x2002
item.description:
@i8u2x2002 wrote:

You can unhide the files in the client by simply right clicking and checking the hidden and read only and then unchecking them.Just check em hit ok then do the same and uncheck them .You will see em eventually

Read full topic
